Reference

All functions

Disp_est_null_family()

Estimate Dispersion Parameters Utilizing Null Families in A Gene Cluster.

Hetero_NB_LRT()

Negative Binomial Likelihood Ratio Test with Known Dispersion for Detection of Mid-parent Heterosis

Hetero_Pois_LRT()

Poisson Likelihood Ratio Test for Detection of Mid-parent Heterosis

Hetero_pip_2sLRT()

Simulation Function for 2sLRT, Poisson LRT and Estimation Method.

Pois_3mean_LRT()

Poisson Likelihood Ratio Test for Equal Family Mean This function conducts Poisson LRT test for detection of null-family in a single family and for a single gene with single replication per genotype. Denote the mean for gene g and female parent as mu_g1, male parent as mu_g2 and hybrid as mu_g3, the null hypothesis is Hg0: mu_g1 = mu_g2 = mu_g3.

hello()

Hello, World!

inverse_func()

Simulation dispersion parameters as a function of mid-parent mean

sim_data

Simulated unreplicated multi-familiy RNA-seq expression data.

twoStageLRT()

Two Stage Likelihood Ratio Test for Detection of Gene Expression Mid-parent Heterosis
